channel.title: Free hosting..[warning pics]
channel.description:
MODS -: IF THIS IS IN THE WRONG SECTION THEN PLEASE MOVE IT
Ok...
do you want free hosting? then go to this [url=http://www.hostinglagoon.com/?ref=4178] [img]http://www.hostinglagoon.com/banners/HostLagoon1.jpg[/img] [/url]
and sgin up! below is a Picture tut on how to! on how to sign up!
First click the banner to take you to the site: [url=http://www.hostinglagoon.com/?ref=4178] [img]http://www.hostinglagoon.com/banners/HostLagoon1.jpg[/img] [/url]
[img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/2690/scr318efe1be6.jpg[/img] then click here: [img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/700/untitled1fh8.png[/img]
then fill in the details.. sorry or e-mail... you need to input a real one to comfirm... [img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/230/33108239fk0.png[/img]
click sign up then open your e-mail account... it will proberbly be in spam... open it and click the link... you will then be able to sign in...
to get the free hosting for: 1 YR FREE HOSTING 2GB SPACE - 20GIG TRANSFER One year of Free Hosting from Dietzel1.
This Plans Includes the following:
* Use of your existing domain name * 2,000MB of Disk Space * 20,000MB of Data Transfer * Unlimited MySql Databases * Unlimited Email Accounts * Unlimited FTP Accounts
you will need 10 points.. just get a banner and send it in e-mails or something... then just let the points roll in...
